name: Enoch
description: Mysterious figure who 'walked with God' for 300 years and was taken to heaven without dying. Transcendent, otherworldly.

walking-with-god.name: Walking with God
walking-with-god.prompt: walking in divine light with ethereal glow - feet barely touching ground, face turned upward in communion, otherworldly presence, the man who walked between worlds

ascending.name: The Ascension
ascending.prompt: rising from earth surrounded by divine light - feet leaving ground, arms slightly raised, face peaceful, the moment of translation to heaven, no death only departure

between-worlds.name: Between Worlds
between-worlds.prompt: standing with one foot in earthly realm, one in heavenly light - split between dimensions, mysterious knowing expression, the man who saw both worlds

three-hundred-years.name: Three Hundred Years
three-hundred-years.prompt: walking through changing seasons and landscapes - time passing around him while he remains constant, the three-hundred-year journey of faith

teaching-methuselah.name: Teaching His Son
teaching-methuselah.prompt: speaking to young Methuselah with hand on his shoulder - passing down divine wisdom, the father of the longest-lived man, legacy of faith

heavenly-vision.name: Heavenly Vision
heavenly-vision.prompt: eyes open wide seeing heavenly realm - face bathed in divine light, glimpsing what mortal eyes cannot see, the prophet who saw beyond
